Which locations were involved in the recreation of 17th century Paris for the film?
Options:
A. A) Paris
B. B) Sarlat-la-Canéda
C. C) The Cité de Carcassonne
D. D) All of the above
Correct Answer: A) Paris, B) Sarlat-la-Canéda, C) The Cité de Carcassonne
